mapper.update: UPDATE graduate SET avatarPath=#{avatarPath} WHERE student_id=#{studentId}
mapper.sql: select g.student_id, g.studentName, g.sex, g.phonenumber, g.homeAddress, g.avatarPath, g.whereabouts, g.cause, g.post, g.company, g.password from graduate g
mapper.select: select g.student_id, g.studentName, g.sex, g.phonenumber, g.homeAddress, g.avatarPath, g.whereabouts, g.cause, g.post, g.company, r.resume_id from graduate g LEFT JOIN resume r on g.student_id=r.student_id INNER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(e.registration_id)as count, e.resume_id from enterprise_history e WHERE e.collection=1 GROUP BY e.resume_id order by count desc limit 5)as st on r.resume_id = st.resume_id

select g.student_id, g.studentName, g.sex, g.phonenumber, g.homeAddress, g.avatarPath, g.whereabouts, g.cause, g.post, g.company, r.resume_id from graduate g LEFT JOIN resume r on g.student_id=r.student_id

SELECT e.student_id, e.studentName,e.sex, e.phonenumber, e.homeAddress, e.avatarPath, e.whereabouts, e.cause, e.post, e.company,r.resume_id FROM (select g.student_id, g.studentName, g.sex, g.phonenumber,g.homeAddress,g.avatarPath, g.whereabouts, g.cause, g.post, g.company from graduate g where g.student_id not IN(SELECT distinct student_id FROM resume ))as e Left JOIN resume r on r.student_id=e.student_id
mapper.insert: insert into Graduate( student_id, studentName, sex, phonenumber, homeAddress, avatarPath, whereabouts, cause, post, company, password )values( #{studentId}, #{studentName}, #{sex}, #{phonenumber}, #{homeAddress}, #{avatarPath}, #{whereabouts}, #{cause}, #{post}, #{company}, #{password} )
